title: The Real Lady A, Karenology 7.10.20
itunes:title: The Real Lady A, Karenology 7.10.20
description:
In episode 669, Miles and guest host Sofiya Alexandra are joined by comedian and Drag Her co-host Mano Agapion to discuss Disneyland re-opening, Lady A(ntebellum) suing the original blues singer Lady A for their new name, Kelly Loeffler showing her ass, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Disney World Draws Excitement and Incredulity as Reopening Nears
  2. Lady A, Formerly Lady Antebellum, Sue Seattle Blues Singer Lady A
  3. Loeffler doubles down against BLM, calls movement 'anti-Semitic' amid continued WNBA blowback
  4. WATCH: Saib - Jet Set

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
